demo_mode.title: Demo Mode
demo_mode.content: Ultima device can be use in demo mode with following conditions.

notes.line1: Use <0>1234</0> as default password for demo user.
notes.line2: You can take <0>maximum {{measurement_count}} measurements</0> in demo mode.
notes.line3: After <0>{{measurement_count}} measurements</0>, Device will be automatically rebooted.
notes.line4: Measurments will not be uploaded to Forge.
notes.line5: You can Logout/Reboot anytime to turn off the demo mode.
notes.line6: Once demo mode turned off, you cannot turn on demo mode again.

notes_default.line2: For object height below <0>0.5 cm/0.2 inch</0>, Step Size is <0>0.1 cm/0.1 inch</0>

notes_ntep.line1: 1. In NTEP mode the measurement step size will be <0>0.5 inch</0>

popup.title: NTEP Confirmation
popup.description: Following changes will be auto applied once after NTEP mode enabled
popup.point1: 1. Calibration status will be reset and device needs to be re-calibrated.
popup.point2: 2. Any non-NTEP scale connected with device, will be disconnected.
popup.point3: 3. Any non-NTEP dimension unit detected, will be reset to <0>Inch-Pound</0>.
popup.point4: 4. NTEP mode will only support <0>1.5</0> setup height.
popup.point5: 5. Default minimum weight for weighing scale will be reset to 0g.
popup.point6: 6. NTEP mode will not support volumetric value round-off methods.
